name: Videogame Bootlegs
description:
"Hey you! I'm Patrick. There's this game that has just been released, and everyone is just crazy on getting their hands on it. I could really use a hand here! If you could sell 6 copies, we'll be done in no time."

The theme I went with is Bootleg Videogames: Microgames based on real videogames, but with original designs.

Made with Godot. Controls are Z, X and arrow keys. This game has sound.

You can change the window size as you want.

6 microgames, no boss fight (sorry).

Font 'Gamer' by memesbruh03

Made for IndieWare Jam
